testsuite.name: Scenario: User calls a rest endpoint to update non exist equipment

testcase.name: When user authenticate with password "test"
testcase.classname: Scenario: User calls a rest endpoint to update non exist equipment

testcase.name: Then the response status code should be 200
testcase.classname: Scenario: User calls a rest endpoint to update non exist equipment

testcase.name: Given the following equipments
testcase.classname: Scenario: User calls a rest endpoint to update non exist equipment

testcase.name: When user sends PUT request to endpoint /equipment/225522u1 with content-type application/json and empty headers and body {"valve": "test", "actuator" :"test","postioner":"test","sensor":"test"}
testcase.classname: Scenario: User calls a rest endpoint to update non exist equipment

testcase.name: Then the response status code should be 404
testcase.classname: Scenario: User calls a rest endpoint to update non exist equipment

testcase.name: And the json response has "apiError" object
testcase.classname: Scenario: User calls a rest endpoint to update non exist equipment

testcase.name: And the json response of the "apiError" should be like that
testcase.classname: Scenario: User calls a rest endpoint to update non exist equipment
